mapper.select: SELECT trg.*, ct.CRON_EXPRESSION FROM qrtz_triggers trg, qrtz_cron_triggers ct WHERE trg.TRIGGER_NAME = ct.TRIGGER_NAME AND trg.TRIGGER_TYPE = 'CRON'
SELECT trg.*, st.REPEAT_COUNT,st.REPEAT_INTERVAL,st.TIMES_TRIGGERED FROM qrtz_triggers trg, qrtz_simple_triggers st WHERE trg.TRIGGER_NAME = st.TRIGGER_NAME AND trg.TRIGGER_TYPE = 'SIMPLE'
